english_example_sentence: If the guests eat delicious food, they will be very happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если гости съедят вкусную еду, они будут очень счастливы.
turkish_example_sentence: Misafirler lezzetli yemek yeseler, çok mutlu olurlar.
